message: The correct way to validate an email address
story: Mohammad Tayseer shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Mail::RFC822::Address

description: Mail::RFC822::Address is a Perl module to validate email addresses according to the RFC 822 grammar. It provides the same functionality as RFC::RFC822::Address, but uses Perl regular expressions rather that the Parse::RecDescent parser.
